Prerequisites:

************
* Software *
************
1. Visual Studio 2019 with Windows SDK installed

*************
* Libraries *
*************
1. GLEW - http://glew.sourceforge.net/ (Download Windows Binaries)
2. GLFW - https://www.glfw.org/download.html (Download 64-bit Windows Binaries)
3. GLM - https://github.com/g-truc/glm (Download ZIP file)
4. Dear ImGui - https://github.com/ocornut/imgui (Download ZIP file and extract to this directory)
5. libPNG - http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/libpng.html (Download source code)

********************************
* Folder Structure             *
********************************
GLEW   -> "/thirdparty/glew-2.1.0"
GLFW   -> "/thirdparty/glfw-3.3.4"
GLM    -> "/thirdparty/glm-master"
IMGUI  -> "/thirdparty/imgui-master"
libPNG -> "/thirdparty/lpng1637"
